sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba motsana wa Kokomeng le metsana e ahisaneng le wona, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa le ho potlakisa ho bulwa hape ha seteishene sa sepolesa sa Kokomeng (Mong I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brenthood Park le Glen Marais (wateng ya 25), Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho putlama ha phepelo e tshepahalang ya motlakase dibakeng tsa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa tjhelete ya rente e hodimo e lefshwang ke badudi ba difoleteng tsa masepala (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Bodudi ba Batho, Metsi le Tlhweko – Seboka sa Naha)

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Germiston, Ekurhuleni ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa ha motlakase Germiston (Mof M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo tsa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho netefatsa hore masepala wa Tzaneen o latela molao, melawana le hore o kenya tshebetsong ho arolwa ho behilweng le ho amehang, ha mmoho le ho beha leihlo mme o thibele diketso tsa ditlolo tsa molao (Mof D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho balemi le badudi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ba emetsweng ke AGRI Letaba, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa haholo ha motlakase, ho ya hodimo le tlase ha motlakase, motlakase o seng matla le ho lokiswa ho fokolang le ho hlokehang ho tloha 2016 ka baka la ho hloleha ha Masepala o Moholo wa Tzaneen (Ms D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: APPENDIXES
sot: DIHLOMATHISO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
sot: MANGOLO A DITLETLEBO A LEBISITSWENG DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo ya baahi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditshebeletso tse sa lekaneng haholo tsa ho tloswa ha matlakala sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba motsana wa Kokomeng le metsana e ahisaneng le wona, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa le ho potlakisa ho bulwa hape ha seteishene sa sepolesa sa Kokomeng (Mong I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brenthood Park le Glen Marais (wateng ya 25), Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho putlama ha phepelo e tshepahalang ya motlakase dibakeng tsa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa tjhelete ya rente e hodimo e lefshwang ke badudi ba difoleteng tsa masepala (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Bodudi ba Batho, Metsi le Tlhweko – Seboka sa Naha)

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Jamestown, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho fetisetswa, ke Eskom, ha matla a taolo ya marangrang a motlakase kwana Jamestown ho masepala wa Stellenbosch (Ngaka L Schreiber) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo ysa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Germiston, Ekurhuleni ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa ha motlakase Germiston (Mof M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo tsa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho netefatsa hore masepala wa Tzaneen o latela molao, melawana le hore o kenya tshebetsong ho arolwa ho behilweng le ho amehang, ha mmoho le ho beha leihlo mme o thibele diketso tsa ditlolo tsa molao (Mof D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho balemi le badudi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ba emetsweng ke AGRI Letaba, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa haholo ha motlakase, ho ya hodimo le tlase ha motlakase, motlakase o seng matla le ho lokiswa ho fokolang le ho hlokehang ho tloha 2016 ka baka la ho hloleha ha Masepala o Moholo wa Tzaneen (Ms D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
sot: MANGOLO A DITLETLEBO A LEBISITSWENG DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo ya baahi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditshebeletso tse sa lekaneng haholo tsa ho tloswa ha matlakala sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba motsana wa Kokomeng le metsana e ahisaneng le wona, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa le ho potlakisa ho bulwa hape ha seteishene sa sepolesa sa Kokomeng (Mong I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brenthood Park le Glen Marais (wateng ya 25), Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho putlama ha phepelo e tshepahalang ya motlakase dibakeng tsa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa tjhelete ya rente e hodimo e lefshwang ke badudi ba difoleteng tsa masepala (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Bodudi ba Batho, Metsi le Tlhweko – Seboka sa Naha)

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Germiston, Ekurhuleni ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa ha motlakase Germiston (Mof M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo tsa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho netefatsa hore masepala wa Tzaneen o latela molao, melawana le hore o kenya tshebetsong ho arolwa ho behilweng le ho amehang, ha mmoho le ho beha leihlo mme o thibele diketso tsa ditlolo tsa molao (Mof D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho balemi le badudi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ba emetsweng ke AGRI Letaba, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa haholo ha motlakase, ho ya hodimo le tlase ha motlakase, motlakase o seng matla le ho lokiswa ho fokolang le ho hlokehang ho tloha 2016 ka baka la ho hloleha ha Masepala o Moholo wa Tzaneen (Ms D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (submitted by Ms H Ismail, MP) and Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (submitted by Ms H Ismail, MP) (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 15).

eng: APPENDIXES
sot: DIHLOMATHISO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
sot: MANGOLO A DITLETLEBO A LEBISITSWENG DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo ya baahi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditshebeletso tse sa lekaneng haholo tsa ho tloswa ha matlakala sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba motsana wa Kokomeng le metsana e ahisaneng le wona, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa le ho potlakisa ho bulwa hape ha seteishene sa sepolesa sa Kokomeng (Mong I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brenthood Park le Glen Marais (wateng ya 25), Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho putlama ha phepelo e tshepahalang ya motlakase dibakeng tsa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa tjhelete ya rente e hodimo e lefshwang ke badudi ba difoleteng tsa masepala (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Bodudi ba Batho, Metsi le Tlhweko – Seboka sa Naha)

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Jamestown, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho fetisetswa, ke Eskom, ha matla a taolo ya marangrang a motlakase kwana Jamestown ho masepala wa Stellenbosch (Ngaka L Schreiber) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo ysa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Germiston, Ekurhuleni ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa ha motlakase Germiston (Mof M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo tsa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho netefatsa hore masepala wa Tzaneen o latela molao, melawana le hore o kenya tshebetsong ho arolwa ho behilweng le ho amehang, ha mmoho le ho beha leihlo mme o thibele diketso tsa ditlolo tsa molao (Mof D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho balemi le badudi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ba emetsweng ke AGRI Letaba, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa haholo ha motlakase, ho ya hodimo le tlase ha motlakase, motlakase o seng matla le ho lokiswa ho fokolang le ho hlokehang ho tloha 2016 ka baka la ho hloleha ha Masepala o Moholo wa Tzaneen (Ms D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha)..

eng: BILLS REFERRED TO JOINT TAGGING MECHANISM (JTM)
sot: DIBILI TSE LEBISITSWENG HO MOIFO WA KOPANELO WA TLHOPHISO YA DIBILI (JTM)

eng: Financial Sector Laws Amendment Bill [B 15 - 2020] (National Assembly – proposed sec 75).
sot: Bili ya Phetolo ya Sekthara ya Melao ya tsa Ditjhelete [B 15 - 2020] (Seboka sa Naha – karolo e sisintsweng ya 75).

eng: BILLS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
sot: DIBILI TSE LEBISITSWENG DIKOMITING

eng: Protection of State Information Bill [B 6H – 2010] (National Assembly – sec 75) and the President’s reservations on the constitutionality of the Bill as submitted to him (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 12 June 2020, p 7) – (Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services – National Assembly).
sot: Bili ya Tshireletso ya Tlhahisoleseding ya Mmuso [B 6H – 2010] (Seboka sa Naha – kar ya 75) le kgwao ya Mopresidente mabapi le ho tsamaelana le Molaotheo ha Bili ena jwaloka ha e rometswe ho yena (Ditsebiso, Ditekwa le Ditlaleho tsa Dikomiri, 12 Phupjane 2020, leq 7) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Toka le Ditshebeletso tsa Tshokollo ya Batshwaruwa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Liquor Products Amendment Bill [B 10B – 2016] (National Assembly – sec 75) and the President’s reservations on the constitutionality of the Bill as submitted to him (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 12 June 2020, p 2) – (Portfolio Committee on Agriculture, Land Reform and Rural Development – National Assembly).
sot: Bili ya Phetolo ya Dihlahiswa tsa Dinotahi [B 10B – 2016] (Seboka sa Naha – kar ya 75) le kgwao ya Mopresidente mabapi le ho tsamaelana le Molaotheo ha Bili ena jwaloka ha e rometswe ho yena (Ditsebiso, Ditekwa le Ditlaleho tsa Dikomiti, 12 Phupjane 2020, leq 2) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Temo, Tlhabollo ya Mobu le Ntshetsopele ya Mahae – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Performers’ Protection Amendment Bill [B 24B - 2016] (National Assembly – sec 75) and the President’s reservations on the constitutionality of the Bill as submitted to him (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 22 June 2020, p 2) – (Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry – National Assembly).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (submitted by Ms H Ismail, MP) and Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (submitted by Ms H Ismail, MP) (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 15).

eng: APPENDIXES
sot: DIHLOMATHISO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
sot: MANGOLO A DITLETLEBO A LEBISITSWENG DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo ya baahi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditshebeletso tse sa lekaneng haholo tsa ho tloswa ha matlakala sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba motsana wa Kokomeng le metsana e ahisaneng le wona, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa le ho potlakisa ho bulwa hape ha seteishene sa sepolesa sa Kokomeng (Mong I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brenthood Park le Glen Marais (wateng ya 25), Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho putlama ha phepelo e tshepahalang ya motlakase dibakeng tsa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa tjhelete ya rente e hodimo e lefshwang ke badudi ba difoleteng tsa masepala (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Bodudi ba Batho, Metsi le Tlhweko – Seboka sa Naha)

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Germiston, Ekurhuleni ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa ha motlakase Germiston (Mof M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo tsa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho netefatsa hore masepala wa Tzaneen o latela molao, melawana le hore o kenya tshebetsong ho arolwa ho behilweng le ho amehang, ha mmoho le ho beha leihlo mme o thibele diketso tsa ditlolo tsa molao (Mof D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho balemi le badudi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ba emetsweng ke AGRI Letaba, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa haholo ha motlakase, ho ya hodimo le tlase ha motlakase, motlakase o seng matla le ho lokiswa ho fokolang le ho hlokehang ho tloha 2016 ka baka la ho hloleha ha Masepala o Moholo wa Tzaneen (Ms D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: BILLS REFERRED TO JOINT TAGGING MECHANISM (JTM)
sot: DIBILI TSE LEBISITSWENG HO MOIFO WA KOPANELO WA TLHOPHISO YA DIBILI (JTM)).

eng: APPENDIXES
sot: DIHLOMATHISO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
sot: MANGOLO A DITLETLEBO A LEBISITSWENG DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo ya baahi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditshebeletso tse sa lekaneng haholo tsa ho tloswa ha matlakala sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba motsana wa Kokomeng le metsana e ahisaneng le wona, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa le ho potlakisa ho bulwa hape ha seteishene sa sepolesa sa Kokomeng (Mong I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brenthood Park le Glen Marais (wateng ya 25), Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho putlama ha phepelo e tshepahalang ya motlakase dibakeng tsa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa tjhelete ya rente e hodimo e lefshwang ke badudi ba difoleteng tsa masepala (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Bodudi ba Batho, Metsi le Tlhweko – Seboka sa Naha)

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Jamestown, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho fetisetswa, ke Eskom, ha matla a taolo ya marangrang a motlakase kwana Jamestown ho masepala wa Stellenbosch (Ngaka L Schreiber) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo ysa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Germiston, Ekurhuleni ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa ha motlakase Germiston (Mof M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo tsa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho netefatsa hore masepala wa Tzaneen o latela molao, melawana le hore o kenya tshebetsong ho arolwa ho behilweng le ho amehang, ha mmoho le ho beha leihlo mme o thibele diketso tsa ditlolo tsa molao (Mof D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho balemi le badudi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ba emetsweng ke AGRI Letaba, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa haholo ha motlakase, ho ya hodimo le tlase ha motlakase, motlakase o seng matla le ho lokiswa ho fokolang le ho hlokehang ho tloha 2016 ka baka la ho hloleha ha Masepala o Moholo wa Tzaneen (Ms D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).

(NCOP: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti e Kgethehileng ho tsa Tshireletso le Toka ka la 24 Mphalane 2019).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (submitted by Ms H Ismail, MP) and Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (submitted by Ms H Ismail, MP) (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 15).
sot: Tshekatsheko ya Tlaleho ya Komiti ya Tshebetso Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Wattville, Benoni ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho shebana le botlokotsebe bo jeleng setsi, ho kenyelletswa tlhekefetso ya tsa bong le tlhekefetso ya bana, le tlhokeho ya seteishene sa sepolesa sebakeng sa bona (e kentswe ke Mof H Ismail MP) le Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditlolo tsa molao tse phahameng le dithethefatsi, phumantsho ya diteishene tsa sepolesa tsa nakwana le dikoloi tsa sepolesa sebakeng sa bona (e kentswe ke Mof H Ismail MP) (Tsebiso, Ditekwa le Ditlaleho tsa Dikomiti 26 Phupjane 2020, leq 15).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Petition of Mr Cornelius Basson (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 10).
sot: Tshekatsheko ya Tlaleho ya Komiti ya Tshebetso ka Lengolo la tletlebo la Monghadi Cornelius Basson ((Tsebiso, Ditekwa le Ditlaleho tsa Dikomiti 26 Phupjane 2020, leq 10).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (submitted by Mr M Waters, MP) (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 4).
sot: Tshekatsheko ya Tlaleho ya Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Kempton Park, ba ipiletsang ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho fokola ha ponahalo ya sepolesa hara motse le tlhokeho ya makoloi seteisheneng sa sepolesa sa Kempton Park (e kentsweng ke Mong M Waters MP) ((Tsebiso, Ditekwa le Ditlaleho tsa Dikomiti 26 Phupjane 2020, leq 4).

eng: Consideration of Report of Joint Standing Committee on Defence on Letters from the President on Employment of South African National Defence Force in Mozambique Channel, Democratic Republic of Congo, to Wuhan City in Hubei Province of People’s Republic of China, and in support of South African Police Service and other State Departments (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 19 June 2020, p 3).
sot: Tshekatsheko ya Tlaleho ya Komiti ya Kopanelo e Ikemetseng ho tsa Tshireletso mabapi le Mangolo a tswang ho Mopresidente mabapi le ho iswa ha Sesole sa Tshireletso sa Naha ya Afrika Borwa Kanaleng ya Mozambique, Rephaboliki ya Demokrasi ya Congo le Toropong ya Wuhan e Provenseng ya Hubei Rephaboliking ya Batho ya China ho tshehetsa sepolesa sa Afrika Borwa le Mafapha a mang a Mmuso (Tsebiso, Ditekwa le Ditlaleho tsa Dikomiti, 19 Phupjane 2020, leq 3).

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
sot: MANGOLO A DITLETLEBO A LEBISITSWENG DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo ya baahi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditshebeletso tse sa lekaneng haholo tsa ho tloswa ha matlakala sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba motsana wa Kokomeng le metsana e ahisaneng le wona, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa le ho potlakisa ho bulwa hape ha seteishene sa sepolesa sa Kokomeng (Mong I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brenthood Park le Glen Marais (wateng ya 25), Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho putlama ha phepelo e tshepahalang ya motlakase dibakeng tsa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa tjhelete ya rente e hodimo e lefshwang ke badudi ba difoleteng tsa masepala (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Bodudi ba Batho, Metsi le Tlhweko – Seboka sa Naha)

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Germiston, Ekurhuleni ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa ha motlakase Germiston (Mof M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo tsa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho netefatsa hore masepala wa Tzaneen o latela molao, melawana le hore o kenya tshebetsong ho arolwa ho behilweng le ho amehang, ha mmoho le ho beha leihlo mme o thibele diketso tsa ditlolo tsa molao (Mof D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho balemi le badudi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ba emetsweng ke AGRI Letaba, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa haholo ha motlakase, ho ya hodimo le tlase ha motlakase, motlakase o seng matla le ho lokiswa ho fokolang le ho hlokehang ho tloha 2016 ka baka la ho hloleha ha Masepala o Moholo wa Tzaneen (Mof D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha)

eng: APPENDIXES
sot: DIHLOMATHISO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
sot: MANGOLO A DITLETLEBO A LEBISITSWENG DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo ya baahi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditshebeletso tse sa lekaneng haholo tsa ho tloswa ha matlakala sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba motsana wa Kokomeng le metsana e ahisaneng le wona, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa le ho potlakisa ho bulwa hape ha seteishene sa sepolesa sa Kokomeng (Mong I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brenthood Park le Glen Marais (wateng ya 25), Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho putlama ha phepelo e tshepahalang ya motlakase dibakeng tsa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa tjhelete ya rente e hodimo e lefshwang ke badudi ba difoleteng tsa masepala (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Bodudi ba Batho, Metsi le Tlhweko – Seboka sa Naha)

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Germiston, Ekurhuleni ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa ha motlakase Germiston (Mof M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo tsa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho netefatsa hore masepala wa Tzaneen o latela molao, melawana le hore o kenya tshebetsong ho arolwa ho behilweng le ho amehang, ha mmoho le ho beha leihlo mme o thibele diketso tsa ditlolo tsa molao (Mof D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho balemi le badudi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ba emetsweng ke AGRI Letaba, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa haholo ha motlakase, ho ya hodimo le tlase ha motlakase, motlakase o seng matla le ho lokiswa ho fokolang le ho hlokehang ho tloha 2016 ka baka la ho hloleha ha Masepala o Moholo wa Tzaneen (Mof D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha)

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
sot: Kananelo ya Tumellano mahareng a Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya India, Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Bofederale wa Brazil le Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa mabapi le Letlole la IBSA la Phokotso ya Bofuma le Tlala (e saennweng ka la 17 Mphalane 2017) (E tekilweng ka la 18 Mphalane 2019) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikamano tsa Matjhaba le Tshebedisanommoho ka la 22 Mphalane 2019). (NCOP: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti e Kgethehileng ho tsa Tshireletso le Toka ka la 24 Mphalane 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
sot: Tumellano pakeng tsa Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setjhaba sa Yuropa sa Matla a Atomo (European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM)) bakeng sa Tshebedisanommoho ho Ditshebediso ka Kgotso tsa Matla a Nyutleliya (E tekilweng ka la 14 Pudungwana 2019) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Mehlodi ya Diminerale le Eneji ka la 18 Pudungwana 2019).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
sot: Tjhata ya Dipalopalo tsa Africa (E Tekilweng ka la 5 Hlakubele 2020) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Ditshebeletso le Tsamaiso ya Setjhaba ka la 9 Tlhakubele 2020),

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020 – reported on 29 July 2020).
sot: Tumellano ya Kutlwano le Tshebedisanommoho (TAC) South East Asia (E tekilweng ka la 18 Tlhakubele 2020) (NA: Ya Fetisetswa ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikamano tsa Matjhaba le Tshebedisanommoho ka la 26 Tlhakubele 2020 – ya tlalehwa ka 11 Phupjane 2020 – ya ananelwa ka la 17 Phupjane 2020) (NCOP: E fetiseditswe ho Komiti e Ikgethang ho tsa Tshireletso le Toka ka la 29 Phupjane 2020 – ya tlalehwa ka la 29 Phupu 2020).

eng: MOTIONS:
sot: DITSHISINYO:

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House, notwithstanding Rule 139(1), which deals with questions for oral reply in respect of the Deputy President, permits that replies in respect of oral questions that were due to be given on 20 August 2020, be submitted in writing as agreed by the National Assembly Programme Committee.
sot: Qeto ya nakwana (Sephadi se Seholo sa Mokga wa Bongata): Hore Ntlo, e behella ka thoko Molawana wa 139(1), o sebetsanang le dipotso tse arajwang ka molomo mabapi le Motlatsi wa Mopresidente, o dumellang hore dikarabo tse mabapi le dipotso tsa molomo tse neng di lokela ho fanwa ka la 20 Phato 2020, di romelwe ka mongolo jwaloka ha ho dumellanwe ke Komiti ya Mananeo ya Seboka sa Naha.

sot: Qeto ka Taba ya Tlaleho ya Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Thuto e Phahameng, Saense le Thekenoloji ka tlaleho ya tshebetso ya Kotara ya Pele ya 2019/20 ka phano ya ditjhelete le ditshebeletso ya Lefapha la Thuto le Thupello e Phahameng (Ditsebiso, Ditekwa le Ditlaleho tsa Dikomiti, 5 Tshitwe 2019, leq 64).

eng: Consideration of Report of Standing Committee on Auditor-General on Integrated Annual Report of Auditor-General for financial year 2018/19 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 4 December 2019, p 3).

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
sot: MANGOLO A DITLETLEBO A LEBISITSWENG DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo ya baahi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditshebeletso tse sa lekaneng haholo tsa ho tloswa ha matlakala sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba motsana wa Kokomeng le metsana e ahisaneng le wona, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa le ho potlakisa ho bulwa hape ha seteishene sa sepolesa sa Kokomeng (Mong I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brenthood Park le Glen Marais (wateng ya 25), Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho putlama ha phepelo e tshepahalang ya motlakase dibakeng tsa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa tjhelete ya rente e hodimo e lefshwang ke badudi ba difoleteng tsa masepala (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Bodudi ba Batho, Metsi le Tlhweko – Seboka sa Naha)

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Germiston, Ekurhuleni ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa ha motlakase Germiston (Mof M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo tsa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho netefatsa hore masepala wa Tzaneen o latela molao, melawana le hore o kenya tshebetsong ho arolwa ho behilweng le ho amehang, ha mmoho le ho beha leihlo mme o thibele diketso tsa ditlolo tsa molao (Mof D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho balemi le badudi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ba emetsweng ke AGRI Letaba, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa haholo ha motlakase, ho ya hodimo le tlase ha motlakase, motlakase o seng matla le ho lokiswa ho fokolang le ho hlokehang ho tloha 2016 ka baka la ho hloleha ha Masepala o Moholo wa Tzaneen (Mof D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

sot: DITUMELLANO TSA MATJHABA

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
sot: Kananelo ya Tumellano mahareng a Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya India, Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Bofederale wa Brazil le Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa mabapi le Letlole la IBSA la Phokotso ya Bofuma le Tlala (e saennweng ka la 17 Mphalane 2017) (E tekilweng ka la 18 Mphalane 2019) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikamano tsa Matjhaba le Tshebedisanommoho ka la 22 Mphalane 2019). (NCOP: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti e Kgethehileng ho tsa Tshireletso le Toka ka la 24 Mphalane 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
sot: Tumellano pakeng tsa Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setjhaba sa Yuropa sa Matla a Atomo (European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM)) bakeng sa Tshebedisanommoho ho Ditshebediso ka Kgotso tsa Matla a Nyutleliya (E tekilweng ka la 14 Pudungwana 2019) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Mehlodi ya Diminerale le Eneji ka la 18 Pudungwana 2019).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
sot: Tjhata ya Dipalopalo tsa Africa (E Tekilweng ka la 5 Hlakubele 2020) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Ditshebeletso le Tsamaiso ya Setjhaba ka la 9 Tlhakubele 2020),

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020 – reported on 29 July 2020).
sot: Tumellano ya Kutlwano le Tshebedisanommoho (TAC) South East Asia (E tekilweng ka la 18 Tlhakubele 2020) (NA: Ya Fetisetswa ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikamano tsa Matjhaba le Tshebedisanommoho ka la 26 Tlhakubele 2020 – ya tlalehwa ka 11 Phupjane 2020 – ya ananelwa ka la 17 Phupjane 2020) (NCOP: E fetiseditswe ho Komiti e Ikgethang ho tsa Tshireletso le Toka ka la 29 Phupjane 2020 – ya tlalehwa ka la 29 Phupu 2020).

sot: DITSHISINYO:

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House extends the deadline by which the Ad Hoc Committee to initiate and introduce legislation amending section 25 of the Constitution has to complete its task to 30 May 2020.
sot: Ntlhakemo ya Nakwana (Sephadi se Seholo sa Mokga wa Bongata): Hore Ntlo e eketsa nako eo ka yona Komiti ya Nakwana bakeng sa ho qala le ho etsa molao o fetolang karolo ya 25 ya Molaotheo e lokelang ho qeta mosebetsi wa yona ho fihlela ka la 29 Motsheanong 2020.

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House revives the Aquaculture Development Bill [B 22 - 2018] (National Assembly –sec 76) and resumes proceedings on the Bill from the stage it reached on the last day of the sixth session of the Fifth Parliament.
sot: Ntlhakemo ya Nakwana (Sephadi se Seholo sa Mokga wa Bongata): Hore Ntlo e tsoselletse Bili ya Ntshetsopele ya Temothuo ya Metsing [B 22 – 2018] (Seboka sa Naha – kar 76) mme e qale mosebetsi ka Bili ena ho tloha moo e felletseng teng ka letsatsi la ho qetela la sehla sa botshelela sa Palamente ya Bohlano.

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
sot: MANGOLO A DITLETLEBO A LEBISITSWENG DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Germiston, masepaleng e moholo wa Ekurhuleni le ipiletsang ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho tima ha motlakase ho jeleng setsi (Mong M Waters) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: 2. 	Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Boksburg, masepaleng e      moholo wa Ekurhuleni, le ipiletsang ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho tima ha motlakase ho jeleng setsi (Mong M Waters) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: 3. 	Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Kempton Park, le ipiletsang ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho fokola ha ponahalo ya sepolesa hara motse le tlhokeho ya makoloi seteisheneng sa sepolesa sa Kempton (Mong M Waters) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: 4. 	Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Alberton, le ipiletsang ho Seboka ho fuputsa seabo sa setjhaba le boikamahanyo ba ketsamolao ntshetsopeleng e hlahisitsweng ya kaho ya matlo mane Alberton (Mong D Bergman) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: 5. 	Tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Wattville, Benoni ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho shebana le botlokotsebe bo jeleng setsi, ho kenyelletswa tlhekefetso ya bong le tlhekefetso ya bana, le tlhokeho ya seteishene sa sepolesa sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: 6. 	Tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditlolo tsa molao tse phahameng le dithethefatsi, phumantsho ya diteishene tsa sepolesa tsa nakwana le dikoloi tsa sepolesa sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Tletlebo ya baahi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditshebeletso tse sa lekaneng haholo tsa ho tloswa ha matlakala sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).

sot: Qeto ya Taba ka Tlaleho ya Komiti ya Tshebetso ya Thuto e Phahameng, Saense le Thekenoloji ka Sekema sa Naha sa Thuso ya Ditjhelete ya Baithuti ka tshebetso ya phumantsho ya ditshebeletso tsa ditjhelete ya 2018/19 (Ditsebiso, Ditekwa le Ditlaleho tsa Komiti, 5 Tshitwe, leq 52).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Basic Education on Petition from the residents of Dryharts village, calling on the Assembly to investigate the re-opening of the Molehabangwe Middle School, submitted by Mr I S Seitlholo, MP (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 February 2020, p 38).

sot: Tekodisiso ya Tlaleho ya Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Thuto ya Motheo ka leeto la tekolo la Ditereke tsa Thuto tsa Capricorn le Sekhukhune, Provenseng ya Limpopo (Ditsebiso, Ditekwa le Ditlaleho tsa Komiti 26 Hlakola 2020, leq 6).

sot: Tekodisiso ya Bili ya Phetolo ya Dipalangwang tsa Mebileng tsa Naha [B 7D – 2016] Seboka sa Naha – kar 76) le Tlaleho ya Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dipalangwang (Ditsebiso, Ditekwa le Ditlaleho tsa Komiti 26 Hlakola 2020, leq 5).

(Ditsebiso, Ditekwa le Ditlaleho tsa Komiti, 5 Tshitwe 2019, leq 4).

eng: APPENDIXES
sot: DIHLOMATHISO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
sot: MANGOLO A DITLETLEBO A LEBISITSWENG DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Germiston, masepaleng e moholo wa Ekurhuleni le ipiletsang ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho tima ha motlakase ho jeleng setsi (Mong M Waters) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: 2. 	Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Boksburg, masepaleng e      moholo wa Ekurhuleni, le ipiletsang ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho tima ha motlakase ho jeleng setsi (Mong M Waters) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: 3. 	Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Kempton Park, le ipiletsang ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho fokola ha ponahalo ya sepolesa hara motse le tlhokeho ya makoloi seteisheneng sa sepolesa sa Kempton (Mong M Waters) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: 4. 	Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Alberton, le ipiletsang ho Seboka ho fuputsa seabo sa setjhaba le boikamahanyo ba ketsamolao ntshetsopeleng e hlahisitsweng ya kaho ya matlo mane Alberton (Mong D Bergman) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: 5. 	Tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Wattville, Benoni ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho shebana le botlokotsebe bo jeleng setsi, ho kenyelletswa tlhekefetso ya bong le tlhekefetso ya bana, le tlhokeho ya seteishene sa sepolesa sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: 6. 	Tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditlolo tsa molao tse phahameng le dithethefatsi, phumantsho ya diteishene tsa sepolesa tsa nakwana le dikoloi tsa sepolesa sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Tletlebo ya baahi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditshebeletso tse sa lekaneng haholo tsa ho tloswa ha matlakala sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba motsana wa Kokomeng le metsana e ahisaneng le wona, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa le ho potlakisa ho bulwa hape ha seteishene sa sepolesa sa Kokomeng (Mong I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Thuto ya Motheo.

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brenthood Park le Glen Marais (wateng ya 25), Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho putlama ha phepelo e tshepahalang ya motlakase dibakeng tsa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
sot: 10.     Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa tjhelete ya rente e hodimo e lefshwang ke badudi ba difoleteng tsa masepala (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Bodudi ba Batho, Metsi le Tlhweko – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Ward 37, Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the illegal occupation of stand 1/1224 number 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs and Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: 11.	Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Wate ya 37, Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho dula ho seng molaong ha setsha sa 1/1224 nomorong ya 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (Mr D Bergman) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Merero ya Setso le Komiti ya Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Convention establishing the Square Kilometre Array (SKA) Observatory (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 – reported on 8 October 2019 – approved on 6 November 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 - reported on 19 February 2020).
sot: Mmoka bakeng sa ho theha Square Kilometre Array (SKA) Observatory (E tekilweng ka la 18 Loetse 2019). (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Thuto e Phahameng, Mahlale le Theknoloji ka la 19 Loetse 2019 – ya tlalehwa ka la 8 Mphalane 2019 – e ananetswe ka la 6 Pudungwana 2019). (NCOP: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti e Ikgethileng ho tsa Thuto le Thekenoloji, Dipapadi, Bonono le Botjhaba ka la 19 Pudungwana 2019 – ya tlalewa ka la 19 Hlakola 2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019).
sot: Tumellano pakeng tsa Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setsi sa Matjhaba bakeng sa Phetolo ya Makgetha a Dimela le Bayothekenoloji (ICGEB) mabapi le ho Thewa ha Karolo ya Setsi sa Matjhaba bakeng sa Phetolo ya Makgetha a Dimela le Bayothekenoloji (ICGEB) Rephaboloking ya Afrika Borwa (E tekilweng ka la 18 Loetse 2019). (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Thuto e Phahameng, Saense le Theknoloji ka la 19 Loetse 2019 – ya tlalewa ka la 5 Tshitwe 2019) (NCOP: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti e Ikgethileng ho tsa Thuto le Thekenoloji, Dipapadi, Bonono le Botjhaba ka la 19 Pudungwana 2019).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
sot: Kananelo ya Tumellano mahareng a Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya India, Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Bofederale wa Brazil le Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa mabapi le Letlole la IBSA la Phokotso ya Bofuma le Tlala (e saennweng ka la 17 Mphalane 2017) (E tekilweng ka la 18 Mphalane 2019) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikamano tsa Matjhaba le Tshebedisanommoho ka la 22 Mphalane 2019). (NCOP: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti e Kgethehileng ho tsa Tshireletso le Toka ka la 24 Mphalane 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Extradition (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020).
sot: Tumellano pakeng tsa Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Bangladesh mabapi le ho Busetswa ha Batho Dinaheng tsa Bona (E tekilweng ka la 14 Pudungwana 2019) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Toka le Ditshebeletso tsa Tshokollo ya Batshwaruwa ka la 18 Pudungwana 2019 – e tlalehilweng ka la 3 Tlhakubele 2020) (NCOP: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti e Kgethehileng ho tsa Tshireletso le Toka ka la 30 Pherekgong 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020).
sot: Tumellano pakeng tsa Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Bangladesh mabapi le ho Thusana ka tsa Molao Ditabeng tsa Bosenyi (E tekilweng ka la 14 Pudungwana 2019) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Toka le Ditshebeletso tsa Tshokollo ya Batshwaruwa ka la 18 Pudungwana 2019 – e tlalehilweng ka la 3 Tlhakubele 2020) (NCOP: E lebisitsweng Komiti e Kgethehileng ho tsa Tshireletso le Toka ka la 30 Pherekgong 2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
sot: Tumellano pakeng tsa Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setjhaba sa Yuropa sa Matla a Atomo (European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM)) bakeng sa Tshebedisanommoho ho Ditshebediso ka Kgotso tsa Matla a Nyutleliya (E tekilweng ka la 14 Pudungwana 2019). eng: APPENDIXES
sot: DIHLOMATHISO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
sot: MANGOLO A DITLETLEBO A LEBISITSWENG DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Kempton Park, le ipiletsang ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho fokola ha ponahalo ya sepolesa hara motse le tlhokeho ya makoloi seteisheneng sa sepolesa sa Kempton (Mong M Waters) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Wattville, Benoni ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho shebana le botlokotsebe bo jeleng setsi, ho kenyelletswa tlhekefetso ya bong le tlhekefetso ya bana, le tlhokeho ya seteishene sa sepolesa sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditlolo tsa molao tse phahameng le dithethefatsi, phumantsho ya diteishene tsa sepolesa tsa nakwana le dikoloi tsa sepolesa sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo ya baahi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditshebeletso tse sa lekaneng haholo tsa ho tloswa ha matlakala sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba motsana wa Kokomeng le metsana e ahisaneng le wona, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa le ho potlakisa ho bulwa hape ha seteishene sa sepolesa sa Kokomeng (Mong I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brenthood Park le Glen Marais (wateng ya 25), Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho putlama ha phepelo e tshepahalang ya motlakase dibakeng tsa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa tjhelete ya rente e hodimo e lefshwang ke badudi ba difoleteng tsa masepala (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Bodudi ba Batho, Metsi le Tlhweko – Seboka sa Naha).
