eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
sot: DITUMELLANO TSA MATJHABA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
sot: Tumellano pakeng tsa Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setsi sa Matjhaba bakeng sa Phetolo ya Makgetha a Dimela le Bayothekenoloji (ICGEB) mabapi le ho Thewa ha Karolo ya Setsi sa Matjhaba bakeng sa Phetolo ya Makgetha a Dimela le Bayothekenoloji (ICGEB) Rephaboloking ya Afrika Borwa (E tekilweng ka la 18 Loetse 2019). (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Thuto e Phahameng, Saense le Theknoloji ka la 19 Loetse 2019 – ya tlalewa ka la 5 Tshitwe 2019 – ya ananelwa ka la 10 Tlhakubele 2020) (NCOP: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti e Ikgethileng ho tsa Thuto le Thekenoloji, Dipapadi, Bonono le Botjhaba ka la 19 Pudungwana 2019 – ya tlalehwa ka la 26 Motsheanong 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
sot: Kananelo ya Tumellano mahareng a Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya India, Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Bofederale wa Brazil le Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa mabapi le Letlole la IBSA la Phokotso ya Bofuma le Tlala (e saennweng ka la 17 Mphalane 2017) (E tekilweng ka la 18 Mphalane 2019) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikamano tsa Matjhaba le Tshebedisanommoho ka la 22 Mphalane 2019). (NCOP: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti e Kgethehileng ho tsa Tshireletso le Toka ka la 24 Mphalane 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
sot: Tumellano pakeng tsa Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setjhaba sa Yuropa sa Matla a Atomo (European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM)) bakeng sa Tshebedisanommoho ho Ditshebediso ka Kgotso tsa Matla a Nyutleliya (E tekilweng ka la 14 Pudungwana 2019) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Mehlodi ya Diminerale le Eneji ka la 18 Pudungwana 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
sot: Tumellano pakeng tsa Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmuso wa Dinaha tse Kopaneng tsa Mexico mabapi le ho Thusana ka tsa Molao Ditabeng tsa Bosenyi (E tekilweng ka la 5 Tlhakubele 2020) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Toka le Ditshebeletso tsa Tshokollo ya Batshwaruwa ka la 9 Tlhakubele 2020) (NCOP: E lebisitswe ho Komiti e Ikgethileng ho tsa Tshireletso le Toka ka la 10 Tlhakubele 2020 – ya tlalehwa ka la 1 Phupjane 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 202 0– approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
sot: Tumellano pakeng tsa Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmuso wa Dinaha tse Kopaneng tsa Mexico mabapi le ho Busetswa ha Batho Dinaheng tsa Bona (E tekilweng ka la 5 Tlhakubele 2020) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Toka le Ditshebeletso tsa Tshokollo ya Batshwaruwa ka la 9 Tlhakubele 2020 – ya tlalehwa ka la 29 Motsheanong 2020). (NCOP: Ya fetisetswa Komiting e Ikgethileng ho tsa Tshireletso le Toka ka la 10 Tlhakubele 2020 – e tlalehilwe ka la 1 Phupjane 2020).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
sot: Tjhata ya Afrika ya Dipalopalo ((E tekilweng ka la 5 Tlhakubele 2020) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Ditshebeletso tsa Setjhaba le Tsamaiso ka la 9 Tlhakubele 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020).
sot: Tumellano ya Kutlwano le Tshebedisanommoho (TAC) South East Asia (E tekilweng ka la 18 Tlhakubele 2020) (NA: Ya Fetisetswa ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikamano tsa Matjhaba le Tshebedisanommoho ka la 26 Tlhakubele 2020 – e tlalehilweng ka la 11 Phupjane 2020 – ya ananelwa ka la 17 Phupjane 2020).

eng: MOTIONS:
sot: DITSHISINYO:

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House –
sot: Ntlhakemo ya nakwana (Sephadi se Seholo sa Mokga wa Bongata): Hore Ntlo –

eng: notes that the term of office of the Auditor-General is due to end on 30 November 2020;
sot: e lemoha hore nako ya mosebetsi ya Mohlakisi-Kakaretso e mathuleng a ho fela ka la 30 Pudungwana 2020;

eng: establishes in terms of Rule 253(1)(a) an ad hoc committee on the appointment of the Auditor-General, the Committee to –
sot: e theha ho latela Molao wa 253(1)(a) Komiti ya Nakwana ya khiro ya Mohlakisi -Kakaretso, Komiti –

eng: nominates a person in terms of section 193 of the Constitution for appointment as Auditor-General;
sot: ho thonya motho ya tla behwa e le Mohlakisi-Kakaretso ho latela karolo ya 193 ya Molaotheo;

eng: consist of 11 members of the National Assembly, as follows: ANC 6, DA 2, EFF 1, and other parties 2;
sot: ho ba le ditho tse 11 tsa Seboka sa Naha ka mokgwa o latelang:  ANC 6, DA 2, EFF 1, mme mekga e meng e be le tse 2;

eng: exercise those powers in Rule 167 necessary to assist it in carrying out its task; and
sot: ho sebedisa matla a teng Molaong wa 167 a hlokahalang ho e thusa ho etsa mosebetsi wa yona; le

eng: report to the House on the nomination of the Auditor-General by 31 August 2020.
sot: ho tlalehela Ntlo ena ka ho thongwa ha Mohlakisi-Kakaretso pele ho la 31 Phato 2020.

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House, notwithstanding Rule 138(2), which provides for rotation of clusters for Questions to Ministers on a weekly basis as determined by the Rules Committee, mandates the National Assembly Programme Committee to make decisions regarding the combination of clusters of government portfolios and the rotation of clusters based on the determination of priorities as and when necessary for the duration of the 2020 annual session.
sot: Ntlhakemo ya nakwana (Sephadi se Seholo sa Mokga wa Bongata): Hore Ntlo, le ha Molao wa 138(2), o bolelang hore dihlopha di araba Dipotso tsa Matona ka tatelano e potolohang beke le beke ka mokgwa o etswang ke Komiti ya Melao, e laela Komiti ya Mananeo ya Seboka sa Naha ho etsa diqeto tse mabapi le ho kopangwa ha dihlopha tsa dipotefoliyo tsa mmuso le ho potoloha ha dihlopha ho latela pehello ya tse bohlokwa ka pele ha ho hlokahala bakeng sa sehla sa selemo sa 2020.

eng: APPENDIXES
sot: DIHLOMATHISO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
sot: MANGOLO A DITLETLEBO A LEBISITSWENG DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Germiston, masepaleng e moholo wa Ekurhuleni le ipiletsang ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho tima ha motlakase ho jeleng setsi (Mong M Waters) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: 2. 	Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Boksburg, masepaleng e      moholo wa Ekurhuleni, le ipiletsang ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho tima ha motlakase ho jeleng setsi (Mong M Waters) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: 3. 	Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Kempton Park, le ipiletsang ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho fokola ha ponahalo ya sepolesa hara motse le tlhokeho ya makoloi seteisheneng sa sepolesa sa Kempton (Mong M Waters) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Alberton, le ipiletsang ho Seboka ho fuputsa seabo sa setjhaba le boikamahanyo ba ketsamolao ntshetsopeleng e hlahisitsweng ya kaho ya matlo mane Alberton (Mong D Bergman) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Wattville, Benoni ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho shebana le botlokotsebe bo jeleng setsi, ho kenyelletswa tlhekefetso ya bong le tlhekefetso ya bana, le tlhokeho ya seteishene sa sepolesa sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditlolo tsa molao tse phahameng le dithethefatsi, phumantsho ya diteishene tsa sepolesa tsa nakwana le dikoloi tsa sepolesa sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo ya baahi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditshebeletso tse sa lekaneng haholo tsa ho tloswa ha matlakala sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on Notices determining remuneration of Public Protector and Commissioners of South African Human Rights Commission with effect from 1 April 2019 (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 22 June 2020, p 15).
sot: 1. Tshekatsheko ya Tlaleho ya Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Toka le Tshokollo ya Batshwaruwa mabapi le Ditsebiso tse behang meputso ya Mosireletsi wa Setjhaba le ya Bakhomishenara ba Khomishene ya Ditokelo tsa Botho ya Afrika Borwa ho tloha ka la 1 Mmesa 2019 (Tsebiso, Ditekwa le Ditlaleho tsa Dikomiti, 22 Phupjane 2020, leq 15).

eng: Consideration of Report of Joint Standing Committee on Defence on Letters from the President on Employment of South African National Defence Force in Mozambique Channel, Democratic Republic of Congo, to Wuhan City in Hubei Province of People’s Republic of China, and in support of South African Police Service and other State Departments (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 19 June 2020, p 3).
sot: 2. Tshekatsheko ya Tlaleho ya Komiti e Ikemetseng ho tsa Tshireletso mabapi le Mangolo a tswang ho Mopresidente mabapi le ho iswa ha Sesole sa Tshireletso sa Naha ya Afrika Borwa Kanaleng ya Mozambique, Rephaboliki ya Demokrasi ya Congo le Toropong ya Wuhan e Provenseng ya Hubei Rephaboliking ya Batho ya China ho tshehetsa sepolesa sa Afrika Borwa le Mafapha a mang a Mmuso (Tsebiso, Ditekwa le Ditlaleho tsa Dikomiti, 19 Phupjane 2020, leq 3).

eng: APPENDIXES
sot: DIHLOMATHISO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
sot: MANGOLO A DITLETLEBO A LEBISITSWENG DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Kempton Park, le ipiletsang ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho fokola ha ponahalo ya sepolesa hara motse le tlhokeho ya makoloi seteisheneng sa sepolesa sa Kempton (Mong M Waters) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Wattville, Benoni ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho shebana le botlokotsebe bo jeleng setsi, ho kenyelletswa tlhekefetso ya bong le tlhekefetso ya bana, le tlhokeho ya seteishene sa sepolesa sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditlolo tsa molao tse phahameng le dithethefatsi, phumantsho ya diteishene tsa sepolesa tsa nakwana le dikoloi tsa sepolesa sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo ya baahi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditshebeletso tse sa lekaneng haholo tsa ho tloswa ha matlakala sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba motsana wa Kokomeng le metsana e ahisaneng le wona, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa le ho potlakisa ho bulwa hape ha seteishene sa sepolesa sa Kokomeng (Mong I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brenthood Park le Glen Marais (wateng ya 25), Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho putlama ha phepelo e tshepahalang ya motlakase dibakeng tsa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa tjhelete ya rente e hodimo e lefshwang ke badudi ba difoleteng tsa masepala (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Bodudi ba Batho, Metsi le Tlhweko – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: APPENDIXES
sot: DIHLOMATHISO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
sot: MANGOLO A DITLETLEBO A LEBISITSWENG DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Germiston, masepaleng e moholo wa Ekurhuleni le ipiletsang ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho tima ha motlakase ho jeleng setsi (Mong M Waters) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: 2. 	Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Boksburg, masepaleng e      moholo wa Ekurhuleni, le ipiletsang ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho tima ha motlakase ho jeleng setsi (Mong M Waters) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: 3. 	Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Kempton Park, le ipiletsang ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho fokola ha ponahalo ya sepolesa hara motse le tlhokeho ya makoloi seteisheneng sa sepolesa sa Kempton (Mong M Waters) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Alberton, le ipiletsang ho Seboka ho fuputsa seabo sa setjhaba le boikamahanyo ba ketsamolao ntshetsopeleng e hlahisitsweng ya kaho ya matlo mane Alberton (Mong D Bergman) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Wattville, Benoni ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho shebana le botlokotsebe bo jeleng setsi, ho kenyelletswa tlhekefetso ya bong le tlhekefetso ya bana, le tlhokeho ya seteishene sa sepolesa sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditlolo tsa molao tse phahameng le dithethefatsi, phumantsho ya diteishene tsa sepolesa tsa nakwana le dikoloi tsa sepolesa sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo ya baahi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditshebeletso tse sa lekaneng haholo tsa ho tloswa ha matlakala sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba motsana wa Kokomeng le metsana e ahisaneng le wona, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa le ho potlakisa ho bulwa hape ha seteishene sa sepolesa sa Kokomeng (Mong I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brenthood Park le Glen Marais (wateng ya 25), Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho putlama ha phepelo e tshepahalang ya motlakase dibakeng tsa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa tjhelete ya rente e hodimo e lefshwang ke badudi ba difoleteng tsa masepala (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Bodudi ba Batho, Metsi le Tlhweko – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Ward 37, Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the illegal occupation of stand 1/1224 number 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs and Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Wate ya 37, Alberton Lebowa, Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho dula ho seng molaong ha setsha sa 1/1224 nomorong ya 42, Second Avenue, Alberton Lebowa (Mong D Bergman) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Merero ya Setso le Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
sot: DITUMELLANO TSA MATJHABA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
sot: Tumellano pakeng tsa Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setsi sa Matjhaba bakeng sa Phetolo ya Makgetha a Dimela le Bayothekenoloji (ICGEB) mabapi le ho Thewa ha Karolo ya Setsi sa Matjhaba bakeng sa Phetolo ya Makgetha a Dimela le Bayothekenoloji (ICGEB) Rephaboloking ya Afrika Borwa (E tekilweng ka la 18 Loetse 2019). (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Thuto e Phahameng, Saense le Theknoloji ka la 19 Loetse 2019 – ya tlalewa ka la 5 Tshitwe 2019 – ya ananelwa ka la 10 Tlhakubele 2020) (NCOP: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti e Ikgethileng ho tsa Thuto le Thekenoloji, Dipapadi, Bonono le Botjhaba ka la 19 Pudungwana 2019 – ya tlalehwa ka la 26 Motsheanong 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
sot: Kananelo ya Tumellano mahareng a Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya India, Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Bofederale wa Brazil le Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa mabapi le Letlole la IBSA la Phokotso ya Bofuma le Tlala (e saennweng ka la 17 Mphalane 2017) (E tekilweng ka la 18 Mphalane 2019) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikamano tsa Matjhaba le Tshebedisanommoho ka la 22 Mphalane 2019). (NCOP: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti e Kgethehileng ho tsa Tshireletso le Toka ka la 24 Mphalane 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
sot: Tumellano pakeng tsa Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setjhaba sa Yuropa sa Matla a Atomo (European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM)) bakeng sa Tshebedisanommoho ho Ditshebediso ka Kgotso tsa Matla a Nyutleliya (E tekilweng ka la 14 Pudungwana 2019) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Mehlodi ya Diminerale le Eneji ka la 18 Pudungwana 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
sot: Tumellano pakeng tsa Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmuso wa Dinaha tse Kopaneng tsa Mexico mabapi le ho Thusana ka tsa Molao Ditabeng tsa Bosenyi (E tekilweng ka la 5 Tlhakubele 2020) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Toka le Ditshebeletso tsa Tshokollo ya Batshwaruwa ka la 9 Tlhakubele 2020) (NCOP: E lebisitswe ho Komiti e Ikgethileng ho tsa Tshireletso le Toka ka la 10 Tlhakubele 2020 – ya tlalehwa ka la 1 Phupjane 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
sot: Tumellano pakeng tsa Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmuso wa Dinaha tse Kopaneng tsa Mexico mabapi le ho Busetswa ha Batho Dinaheng tsa Bona (E tekilweng ka la 5 Tlhakubele 2020) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Toka le Ditshebeletso tsa Tshokollo ya Batshwaruwa ka la 9 Tlhakubele 2020 – ya tlalehwa ka la 29 Motsheanong 2020). (NCOP: Ya fetisetswa Komiting e Ikgethileng ho tsa Tshireletso le Toka ka la 10 Tlhakubele 2020 – e tlalehilwe ka la 1 Phupjane 2020).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
sot: Tjhata ya Afrika ya Dipalopalo ((E tekilweng ka la 5 Tlhakubele 2020) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Ditshebeletso tsa Setjhaba le Tsamaiso ka la 9 Tlhakubele 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020).
sot: Tumellano ya Kutlwano le Tshebedisanommoho (TAC) South East Asia (E tekilweng ka la 18 Tlhakubele 2020) (NA: Ya Fetisetswa ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikamano tsa Matjhaba le Tshebedisanommoho ka la 26 Tlhakubele 2020).

eng: MOTIONS:
sot: DITSHISINYO:

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House suspends Rule 290(2)(a), which provides inter alia that the debate on the Second Reading of the Bill may not commence before at least three Assembly working days have elapsed since the committee’s report was tabled, for the purposes of conducting the Second Reading today on the Adjustments Appropriation Bill [B 10B - 2020] (National Assembly – sec 77).
sot: Ntlhakemo ya Nakwana (Sephadi se Seholo sa Mokga wa Bongata): Hore Ntlo e behella ka thoko Molao wa 290(2)(a), o bolelang hara tse ding hore Ngangisano ya Palo ya Bobedi ya Bili e ke se qale pele ho fela bonyane matsatsi a mararo a ho sebetsa ha Seboka ho tloha ho tekilwe tlaleho ya komiti, bakeng sa ho etsa Palo ya Bobedi kajeno ya Bili ya Ditokiso tsa Kabo [B 10B - 2020] (Seboka sa Naha – kar 77).

eng: APPENDIXES
sot: DIHLOMATHISO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
sot: MANGOLO A DITLETLEBO A LEBISITSWENG DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo ya baahi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditshebeletso tse sa lekaneng haholo tsa ho tloswa ha matlakala sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba motsana wa Kokomeng le metsana e ahisaneng le wona, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa le ho potlakisa ho bulwa hape ha seteishene sa sepolesa sa Kokomeng (Mong I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brenthood Park le Glen Marais (wateng ya 25), Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho putlama ha phepelo e tshepahalang ya motlakase dibakeng tsa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa tjhelete ya rente e hodimo e lefshwang ke badudi ba difoleteng tsa masepala (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Bodudi ba Batho, Metsi le Tlhweko – Seboka sa Naha)

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Jamestown, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho fetisetswa, ke Eskom, ha matla a taolo ya marangrang a motlakase kwana Jamestown ho masepala wa Stellenbosch (Ngaka L Schreiber) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo ysa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Germiston, Ekurhuleni ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa ha motlakase Germiston (Mof M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo tsa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho netefatsa hore masepala wa Tzaneen o latela molao, melawana le hore o kenya tshebetsong ho arolwa ho behilweng le ho amehang, ha mmoho le ho beha leihlo mme o thibele diketso tsa ditlolo tsa molao (Mof D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho balemi le badudi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ba emetswweng ke AGRI Letaba, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa haholo ha motlakase, ho ya hodimo le tlase ha motlakase, motlakase o seng matla le ho lokiswa ho fokolang le ho hlokehang ho tloha 2016 ka baka la ho hloleha ha Masepala o Moholo wa Tzaneen (Ms D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: BILLS REFERRED TO JOINT TAGGING MECHANISM (JTM)
sot: DIBILI TSE LEBISITSWENG HO MOIFO WA KOPANELO WA TLHOPHISO YA DIBILI (JTM)

eng: APPENDIXES
sot: DIHLOMATHISO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
sot: MANGOLO A DITLETLEBO A LEBISITSWENG DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo ya baahi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditshebeletso tse sa lekaneng haholo tsa ho tloswa ha matlakala sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba motsana wa Kokomeng le metsana e ahisaneng le wona, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa le ho potlakisa ho bulwa hape ha seteishene sa sepolesa sa Kokomeng (Mong I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brenthood Park le Glen Marais (wateng ya 25), Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho putlama ha phepelo e tshepahalang ya motlakase dibakeng tsa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa tjhelete ya rente e hodimo e lefshwang ke badudi ba difoleteng tsa masepala (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Bodudi ba Batho, Metsi le Tlhweko – Seboka sa Naha)

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Jamestown, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho fetisetswa, ke Eskom, ha matla a taolo ya marangrang a motlakase kwana Jamestown ho masepala wa Stellenbosch (Ngaka L Schreiber) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo ysa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Germiston, Ekurhuleni ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa ha motlakase Germiston (Mof M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo tsa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho netefatsa hore masepala wa Tzaneen o latela molao, melawana le hore o kenya tshebetsong ho arolwa ho behilweng le ho amehang, ha mmoho le ho beha leihlo mme o thibele diketso tsa ditlolo tsa molao (Mof D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho balemi le badudi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ba emetswweng ke AGRI Letaba, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa haholo ha motlakase, ho ya hodimo le tlase ha motlakase, motlakase o seng matla le ho lokiswa ho fokolang le ho hlokehang ho tloha 2016 ka baka la ho hloleha ha Masepala o Moholo wa Tzaneen (Ms D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: BILLS REFERRED TO JOINT TAGGING MECHANISM (JTM)
sot: DIBILI TSE LEBISITSWENG HO MOIFO WA KOPANELO WA TLHOPHISO YA DIBILI (JTM)

eng: APPENDIXES
sot: DIHLOMATHISO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
sot: MANGOLO A DITLETLEBO A LEBISITSWENG DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo ya baahi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditshebeletso tse sa lekaneng haholo tsa ho tloswa ha matlakala sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba motsana wa Kokomeng le metsana e ahisaneng le wona, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa le ho potlakisa ho bulwa hape ha seteishene sa sepolesa sa Kokomeng (Mong I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brenthood Park le Glen Marais (wateng ya 25), Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho putlama ha phepelo e tshepahalang ya motlakase dibakeng tsa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa tjhelete ya rente e hodimo e lefshwang ke badudi ba difoleteng tsa masepala (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Bodudi ba Batho, Metsi le Tlhweko – Seboka sa Naha)

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Jamestown, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho fetisetswa, ke Eskom, ha matla a taolo ya marangrang a motlakase kwana Jamestown ho masepala wa Stellenbosch (Ngaka L Schreiber) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo ysa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Germiston, Ekurhuleni ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa ha motlakase Germiston (Mof M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo tsa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho netefatsa hore masepala wa Tzaneen o latela molao, melawana le hore o kenya tshebetsong ho arolwa ho behilweng le ho amehang, ha mmoho le ho beha leihlo mme o thibele diketso tsa ditlolo tsa molao (Mof D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho balemi le badudi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ba emetswweng ke AGRI Letaba, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa haholo ha motlakase, ho ya hodimo le tlase ha motlakase, motlakase o seng matla le ho lokiswa ho fokolang le ho hlokehang ho tloha 2016 ka baka la ho hloleha ha Masepala o Moholo wa Tzaneen (Ms D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: BILLS REFERRED TO JOINT TAGGING MECHANISM (JTM)
sot: DIBILI TSE LEBISITSWENG HO MOIFO WA KOPANELO WA TLHOPHISO YA DIBILI (JTM)

eng: APPENDIXES
sot: DIHLOMATHISO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
sot: MANGOLO A DITLETLEBO A LEBISITSWENG DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo ya baahi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditshebeletso tse sa lekaneng haholo tsa ho tloswa ha matlakala sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba motsana wa Kokomeng le metsana e ahisaneng le wona, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa le ho potlakisa ho bulwa hape ha seteishene sa sepolesa sa Kokomeng (Mong I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brenthood Park le Glen Marais (wateng ya 25), Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho putlama ha phepelo e tshepahalang ya motlakase dibakeng tsa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa tjhelete ya rente e hodimo e lefshwang ke badudi ba difoleteng tsa masepala (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Bodudi ba Batho, Metsi le Tlhweko – Seboka sa Naha)

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Jamestown, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho fetisetswa, ke Eskom, ha matla a taolo ya marangrang a motlakase kwana Jamestown ho masepala wa Stellenbosch (Ngaka L Schreiber) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo ysa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Germiston, Ekurhuleni ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa ha motlakase Germiston (Mof M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo tsa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho netefatsa hore masepala wa Tzaneen o latela molao, melawana le hore o kenya tshebetsong ho arolwa ho behilweng le ho amehang, ha mmoho le ho beha leihlo mme o thibele diketso tsa ditlolo tsa molao (Mof D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho balemi le badudi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ba emetswweng ke AGRI Letaba, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa haholo ha motlakase, ho ya hodimo le tlase ha motlakase, motlakase o seng matla le ho lokiswa ho fokolang le ho hlokehang ho tloha 2016 ka baka la ho hloleha ha Masepala o Moholo wa Tzaneen (Ms D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: BILLS REFERRED TO JOINT TAGGING MECHANISM (JTM)
sot: DIBILI TSE LEBISITSWENG HO MOIFO WA KOPANELO WA TLHOPHISO YA DIBILI (JTM)

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).

(NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Thuto e Phahameng, Saense le Theknoloji ka la 19 Loetse 2019 – ya tlalewa ka la 5 Tshitwe 2019 – ya ananelwa ka la 10 Tlhakubele 2020) (NCOP: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti e Ikgethileng ho tsa Thuto le Thekenoloji, Dipapadi, Bonono le Botjhaba ka la 19 Pudungwana 2019 – ya tlalehwa ka la 26 Motsheanong 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
sot: Kananelo ya Tumellano mahareng a Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya India, Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Bofederale wa Brazil le Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa mabapi le Letlole la IBSA la Phokotso ya Bofuma le Tlala (e saennweng ka la 17 Mphalane 2017) (E tekilweng ka la 18 Mphalane 2019) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikamano tsa Matjhaba le Tshebedisanommoho ka la 22 Mphalane 2019). (NCOP: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti e Kgethehileng ho tsa Tshireletso le Toka ka la 24 Mphalane 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).

sot: Tumellano pakeng tsa Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmuso wa Dinaha tse Kopaneng tsa Mexico mabapi le ho Thusana ka tsa Molao Ditabeng tsa Bosenyi (E tekilweng ka la 5 Tlhakubele 2020) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Toka le Ditshebeletso tsa Tshokollo ya Batshwaruwa ka la 9 Tlhakubele 2020) (NCOP: E lebisitswe ho Komiti e Ikgethileng ho tsa Tshireletso le Toka ka la 10 Tlhakubele 2020 – ya tlalehwa ka la 1 Phupjane 2020).

eng: APPENDIXES
sot: DIHLOMATHISO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
sot: MANGOLO A DITLETLEBO A LEBISITSWENG DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo ya baahi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditshebeletso tse sa lekaneng haholo tsa ho tloswa ha matlakala sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba motsana wa Kokomeng le metsana e ahisaneng le wona, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa le ho potlakisa ho bulwa hape ha seteishene sa sepolesa sa Kokomeng (Mong I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brenthood Park le Glen Marais (wateng ya 25), Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho putlama ha phepelo e tshepahalang ya motlakase dibakeng tsa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa tjhelete ya rente e hodimo e lefshwang ke badudi ba difoleteng tsa masepala (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Bodudi ba Batho, Metsi le Tlhweko – Seboka sa Naha)

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Jamestown, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho fetisetswa, ke Eskom, ha matla a taolo ya marangrang a motlakase kwana Jamestown ho masepala wa Stellenbosch (Ngaka L Schreiber) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo ysa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Germiston, Ekurhuleni ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa ha motlakase Germiston (Mof M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo tsa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho netefatsa hore masepala wa Tzaneen o latela molao, melawana le hore o kenya tshebetsong ho arolwa ho behilweng le ho amehang, ha mmoho le ho beha leihlo mme o thibele diketso tsa ditlolo tsa molao (Mof D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho balemi le badudi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ba emetswweng ke AGRI Letaba, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa haholo ha motlakase, ho ya hodimo le tlase ha motlakase, motlakase o seng matla le ho lokiswa ho fokolang le ho hlokehang ho tloha 2016 ka baka la ho hloleha ha Masepala o Moholo wa Tzaneen (Ms D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: BILLS REFERRED TO JOINT TAGGING MECHANISM (JTM)
sot: DIBILI TSE LEBISITSWENG HO MOIFO WA KOPANELO WA TLHOPHISO YA DIBILI (JTM)

eng: MOTIONS (Notice given on 26 June 2020):
sot: DITSHISINYO (Tsebiso e entsweng ka la 26 Phupjane 2020):

eng: Subject for discussion (Mr K J Mileham): The impending shortage of diesel in the Republic and the dire consequences this will have on the country’s ailing economy and food security.
sot: Taba e tla tshohlwa (Mong K J Mileham): Kgaello ya dizile e tlo ba teng Rephaboliking le ditlamorao tse mpe tseo e tla ba le tsona moruong o thekeselang wan aha le ho boteng ba dijo.

eng: APPENDIXES
sot: DIHLOMATHISO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
sot: MANGOLO A DITLETLEBO A LEBISITSWENG DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo ya baahi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditshebeletso tse sa lekaneng haholo tsa ho tloswa ha matlakala sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: 2. Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba motsana wa Kokomeng le metsana e ahisaneng le wona, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa le ho potlakisa ho bulwa hape ha seteishene sa sepolesa sa Kokomeng (Mong I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: 3. Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brenthood Park le Glen Marais (wateng ya 25), Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho putlama ha phepelo e tshepahalang ya motlakase dibakeng tsa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletsoho Seboka ho fuputsa tjhelete ya rente e hodimo e lefshwang ke badudi ba difoleteng tsa masepala (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Bodudi ba Batho, Metsi le Tlhweko – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Jamestown, Stellenbosch, le etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa phetisetso ya matla a taolo ya marangrang a motlakase wa Jamestown ho Masepala wa Stellenbosch ke Eskom (Ngk L Shreiber) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikwebo tsa Mmuso -  Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Germiston, Ekurhuleni, le etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa power outages in Germiston (Mof M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikwebo tsa Mmuso - Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, le etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho netefatsa hore masepala wa Tzaneen o ikamahanya le melao, melao le melawana ya bomasepala, le hore a kenye tshebetsong dipehelo tsa tikoloho le tsa tshebediso ya mobu tse sebetsang, hammoho le ho disa le ho tlohela diketso tsohle tse seng molaong (Mof D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Merero ya Setso - Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho borapolasi le setjhaba sa Tzaneen, Limpopo, ba emetsweng ke AGRI Letaba, le etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho tima ha motlakase ho totileng, ho hloka botsitso ha motlakase, matla a fokolang a motlakase le tokiso e mpe ho isa ho siyo ya motlakase ho tloha ka 2016 ka lebaka la ho hloleha ha Masepala e Moholo wa Greater Tzaneen (Mof D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Merero ya Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

sot: Lengolo la tletlebo ya baahi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditshebeletso tse sa lekaneng haholo tsa ho tloswa ha matlakala sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba motsana wa Kokomeng le metsana e ahisaneng le wona, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa le ho potlakisa ho bulwa hape ha seteishene sa sepolesa sa Kokomeng (Mong I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brenthood Park le Glen Marais (wateng ya 25), Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho putlama ha phepelo e tshepahalang ya motlakase dibakeng tsa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa tjhelete ya rente e hodimo e lefshwang ke badudi ba difoleteng tsa masepala (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Bodudi ba Batho, Metsi le Tlhweko – Seboka sa Naha)

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Jamestown, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho fetisetswa, ke Eskom, ha matla a taolo ya marangrang a motlakase kwana Jamestown ho masepala wa Stellenbosch (Ngaka L Schreiber) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo ysa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Germiston, Ekurhuleni ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa ha motlakase Germiston (Mof M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo tsa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho netefatsa hore masepala wa Tzaneen o latela molao, melawana le hore o kenya tshebetsong ho arolwa ho behilweng le ho amehang, ha mmoho le ho beha leihlo mme o thibele diketso tsa ditlolo tsa molao (Mof D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho balemi le badudi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ba emetswweng ke AGRI Letaba, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa haholo ha motlakase, ho ya hodimo le tlase ha motlakase, motlakase o seng matla le ho lokiswa ho fokolang le ho hlokehang ho tloha 2016 ka baka la ho hloleha ha Masepala o Moholo wa Tzaneen (Ms D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House designates Dr M Q Ndlozi to replace Mr G A Gardee on the Magistrates Commission in terms of section 3(1)(a)(x) of the Magistrates Act (No 90 of 1993).
sot: Qeto ya Nakwana (Sephadi se Seholo sa Mokga wa Bongata): Hore e behe Ngaka M Q Ndlozi ho kena sebakeng sa Monghadi G A Gardee Komishineng ya Bomagiseterata ho ya ka karolo ya 3(1)(a)(x) ya Molao wa Bomagiseterata (No ya 90 wa 1993).

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House suspends Rule 290(2)(a), which provides inter alia that the debate on the Second Reading of the Bill may not commence before at least three Assembly working days have elapsed since the committee’s report was tabled, for the purposes of conducting the Second Reading today on the Division of Revenue Amendment Bill [B 9 - 2020] (National Assembly – sec 76).
sot: 2	Qeto ya nakwana (Sephadi se Seholo sa Mokga wa Bongata) Hore Ntlo e emise Molao wa 290(a), o lokisetsang, hara tse ding, hore ngangisano ka Palo ya Bobedi ya Bili e se qale bonyane pele ho matsatsi a mararo a ho sebetsa ha Seboka a fetile ho tloha mohla tlaleho ya komiti e tekilwe, bakeng sa ho etsa Palo ya Bobedi kajeno ka Bili ya Phetolo ya Karolo ya Kuno [B9 – 2020] (Seboka sa Naha – kar ya 76).

sot: Lengolo la tletlebo ya baahi ba Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ditshebeletso tse sa lekaneng haholo tsa ho tloswa ha matlakala sebakeng sa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba motsana wa Kokomeng le metsana e ahisaneng le wona, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa le ho potlakisa ho bulwa hape ha seteishene sa sepolesa sa Kokomeng (Mong I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Sepolesa – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Bredell, Pomona, Brenthood Park le Glen Marais (wateng ya 25), Toropo ya Ekurhuleni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho putlama ha phepelo e tshepahalang ya motlakase dibakeng tsa bona (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo la baahi ba Actonville, Benoni, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa tjhelete ya rente e hodimo e lefshwang ke badudi ba difoleteng tsa masepala (Mof H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Bodudi ba Batho, Metsi le Tlhweko – Seboka sa Naha)

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo le tswang ho baahi ba Jamestown, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho fetisetswa, ke Eskom, ha matla a taolo ya marangrang a motlakase kwana Jamestown ho masepala wa Stellenbosch (Ngaka L Schreiber) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo ysa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Germiston, Ekurhuleni ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa ha motlakase Germiston (Mof M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikgwebo tsa Setjhaba – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho baahi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho netefatsa hore masepala wa Tzaneen o latela molao, melawana le hore o kenya tshebetsong ho arolwa ho behilweng le ho amehang, ha mmoho le ho beha leihlo mme o thibele diketso tsa ditlolo tsa molao (Mof D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Kopanelo le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
sot: Lengolo la tletlebo e tswang ho balemi le badudi ba Tzaneen, Limpopo, ba emetswweng ke AGRI Letaba, ba etsang kgoeletso ho Seboka ho fuputsa ho kgaolwa haholo ha motlakase, ho ya hodimo le tlase ha motlakase, motlakase o seng matla le ho lokiswa ho fokolang le ho hlokehang ho tloha 2016 ka baka la ho hloleha ha Masepala o Moholo wa Tzaneen (Ms D van der Walt) - (Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Puso ya Tshebedisanommoho le Ditaba tsa Setso – Seboka sa Naha).
