eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
sot: Tumellano pakeng tsa Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setsi sa Matjhaba bakeng sa Phetolo ya Makgetha a Dimela le Bayothekenoloji (ICGEB) mabapi le ho Thewa ha Karolo ya Setsi sa Matjhaba bakeng sa Phetolo ya Makgetha a Dimela le Bayothekenoloji (ICGEB) Rephaboloking ya Afrika Borwa (E tekilweng ka la 18 Loetse 2019). (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Thuto e Phahameng, Saense le Theknoloji ka la 19 Loetse 2019 – ya tlalewa ka la 5 Tshitwe 2019 – ya ananelwa ka la 10 Tlhakubele 2020) (NCOP: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti e Ikgethileng ho tsa Thuto le Thekenoloji, Dipapadi, Bonono le Botjhaba ka la 19 Pudungwana 2019 – ya tlalehwa ka la 26 Motsheanong 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
sot: Kananelo ya Tumellano mahareng a Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya India, Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Bofederale wa Brazil le Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa mabapi le Letlole la IBSA la Phokotso ya Bofuma le Tlala (e saennweng ka la 17 Mphalane 2017) (E tekilweng ka la 18 Mphalane 2019) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikamano tsa Matjhaba le Tshebedisanommoho ka la 22 Mphalane 2019). (NCOP: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti e Kgethehileng ho tsa Tshireletso le Toka ka la 24 Mphalane 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
sot: Tumellano pakeng tsa Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setjhaba sa Yuropa sa Matla a Atomo (European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM)) bakeng sa Tshebedisanommoho ho Ditshebediso ka Kgotso tsa Matla a Nyutleliya (E tekilweng ka la 14 Pudungwana 2019) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Mehlodi ya Diminerale le Eneji ka la 18 Pudungwana 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
sot: Tumellano pakeng tsa Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmuso wa Dinaha tse Kopaneng tsa Mexico mabapi le ho Thusana ka tsa Molao Ditabeng tsa Bosenyi (E tekilweng ka la 5 Tlhakubele 2020) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Toka le Ditshebeletso tsa Tshokollo ya Batshwaruwa ka la 9 Tlhakubele 2020) (NCOP: E lebisitswe ho Komiti e Ikgethileng ho tsa Tshireletso le Toka ka la 10 Tlhakubele 2020 – ya tlalehwa ka la 1 Phupjane 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 202 0– approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
sot: Tumellano pakeng tsa Mmuso wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmuso wa Dinaha tse Kopaneng tsa Mexico mabapi le ho Busetswa ha Batho Dinaheng tsa Bona (E tekilweng ka la 5 Tlhakubele 2020) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Toka le Ditshebeletso tsa Tshokollo ya Batshwaruwa ka la 9 Tlhakubele 2020 – ya tlalehwa ka la 29 Motsheanong 2020). (NCOP: Ya fetisetswa Komiting e Ikgethileng ho tsa Tshireletso le Toka ka la 10 Tlhakubele 2020 – e tlalehilwe ka la 1 Phupjane 2020).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
sot: Tjhata ya Afrika ya Dipalopalo ((E tekilweng ka la 5 Tlhakubele 2020) (NA: E lebisitsweng ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Ditshebeletso tsa Setjhaba le Tsamaiso ka la 9 Tlhakubele 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020).
sot: Tumellano ya Kutlwano le Tshebedisanommoho (TAC) South East Asia (E tekilweng ka la 18 Tlhakubele 2020) (NA: Ya Fetisetswa ho Komiti ya Tshebetso ho tsa Dikamano tsa Matjhaba le Tshebedisanommoho ka la 11 Phupjane 2020 – e tlalehilweng ka la 11 Phupjane 2020 – ya ananelwa ka la 29 Phupjane 2020).
